name: howhap
description: A small library for dealing with parameterized errors

scripts.build: npm run test && ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js ./src/index.js -o ./dist/index.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -d -p [minifyify --map ./dist/index.min.map --output ./dist/index.min.map] && babel ./src/index.js --out-file ./dist/index.js

author: Aaron Larner
